Koga Shuko/Serpentor:



Shuko looked to Cyber Claw.  "You heard me, go through your memory files if 
you need a complete listing of it, of course you'll die before you get the 
opprertunity!" he said, raising his laser rifle pulled from subspace in a 
mere second, firing a shot off at Cyber Claw.

---

Serpentor chuckled madly, firing three plasma shots off at Cyber.
